title: Ticket #6332: Help users deal with missing default VPCs/subnet IDs
description:
Security groups are VPC-specific; the default stack creates the security group we need (implicitly) in the default VPC. Therefore:

  1. Add an option to condor_annex -setup to set the VPC and subnet IDs;
  2. check if your account has a default VPC early, so we print a good error message rather than just fail to construct the security group stack;
  3. pass the VPC ID through to the security group constructor somehow (use a different template?);
  4. pass both options through into the user-specific config file we write;
  5. pull them back out again for ODI instances.
  6. Also allow the subnet ID to be specified on the command-line (but not the VPC ID, since that entails regenerating the security group).
